description: A small cute cloth ribbon. There is no defensive power, but may heal you in this ruined world.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A cute stuffed toy attached to your body. Offers no support other than morale.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
An impractically lacy dress from the Gothic Lolita subculture. Despite all the laces, it is surprisingly easy to move in.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A lacy headdress meant to be worn with the dress. It attracts attention.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
